name: Couatl
description: A magnificent feathered serpent that soars through the skies. Couatl are sacred beasts revered by the Naga, capable of powerful lightning attacks from above.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Releases a bolt of lightning that jumps between up to 4 enemies, dealing decreasing damage.

abilities.name: Mana Burn
abilities.description: Burns enemy mana and deals damage equal to mana burned.
